players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice killed Diana. I investigated her and found she's the mafia. Vote her out."
You: "I didn't kill Diana. Charlie's investigation could be wrong. Bob, you might be the mafia."
Bob: "Alice, you accuse Bob, but Charlie's investigation found you as mafia. That’s strong evidence. I think we should vote Alice out."
You: "I didn't kill Diana. Maybe Charlie's investigation was wrong. Bob, you might be the mafia."
Bob: "Charlie’s claim that he investigated Diana is impossible—only the detective can investigate. He’s lying, so he must be the mafia. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Bob, you can't investigate Diana—only the detective can. So you're lying. Alice is the mafia. Vote her out."

Alice was arrested
